doc.title: Jr. Lab Ratz
doc.plot: Isaac Adams is the king of Galileo High School, and the American record holder for the most officially recognized high school year book clubs. He is one club behind the world record holder in Uzbekistan. With the help of his best friend Algae and the advice of his gym teacher, Marty Kraft, Isaac forms the "Science Alliance." Along with charter members Charlie Dee, Calvin Watts, Jane Marie Vega, and of course Algae, Isaac must perform and document several amazing experiments in time to make the "Science Alliance" a new club and bring back the glory to the United States. All the while, Jack Bulle', the school bully is hunting Algae, who knows a secret that could ruin Jack and put the record in danger.
